speaker: President.
english: President. I do not know, Mr Chichester, whether you aspire to the office of President of the European Parliament. Should you be President one day, you will realise that my purpose was not so much to go for a meal as to fulfil numerous obligations.
original: President. I do not know, Mr Chichester, whether you aspire to the office of President of the European Parliament. Should you be President one day, you will realise that my purpose was not so much to go for a meal as to fulfil numerous obligations.
agenda_item: Reducing disparities in the poorest regions of the EU (debate)
